member.name: T:ABB.Robotics.RobotStudio.UI.WpfCheckedTreeNode
member.summary: Represents a node in a with a check box.
member.remarks: This node should be used in a grid-style with a control in the data template. The CheckBox control should be bound to the "Object.IsChecked" property and have "IsThreeState" set to true. Other bindable properties are "CheckBoxEnabled" and "CheckBoxVisibility".
